recipe.title: 5-Ingredient Chocolate Almond Butter Balls Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; dark chocolate, melted ; (113 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, mix almond flour, almond butter, and vanilla extract. Create round balls using your hands.
Place onto a baking sheet and chill for 20 minutes or until solid.
In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the chocolate in 30-second intervals.
Individually coat eat ball in the chocolate and place back onto the baking sheet.
Sprinkle with sea salt, if desired.
